yaml.title: NASA Openscapes Champions Cohort
yaml.description: Openscapes Champions Cohort for research teams using data from NASA Distributed Active Archive Centers (DAACs) and interested in open science and migrating their analytical workflows to the cloud.

markdown.markdown:
```{r setup, include=FALSE} knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE) ``` This is a mentorship and professional development opportunity for research teams; please see [**nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions**](https://nasa-openscapes.github.io/champions) for details.
```{r, out.width="40%", fig.align='center', preview=TRUE} knitr::include_graphics("nasa-openscapes.png") ```
